products.title: Berkley Sand
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Berkley Sand Perfect Fit Roller Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Perfect Fit Roller Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 350mm Max Width: 1400mm

 	Fabric Composition: Polyester
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
